overview:
Justin Eckrich is the Founder of Inspyre Marketing, a full service Google Adwords Agency.

He has been an avid student of direct response marketing since 2001, when his first sales job was going door to door selling vinyl siding.

Since then, he’s become an accomplished copywriter, as well Adwords Consultant, and gives much of the credit to his mentor, Perry Marshall.

Mr. Eckrich started studying Internet Marketing in 2007, as a way out of the grueling middle management job he was stuck in.

And within 14 months of starting Google Adwords, he generated over $2,000,000 for his company.

In 2011, Justin jumped ship from his Corporate job, where he was the V.P. of Marketing, and dove head first into Internet Marketing Consulting.

His vision is to create a Billion Dollar Digital Real Estate Empire, leveraging his understanding of direct response marketing, copywriting, and creative strategic thinking.

Of all his strengths, he says that, “Being an awesome Dad,” is his greatest asset.

His favorite Scripture is Romans 12:2, “Do not be conformed to this world, but be ye transformed by the renewing of your mind.”

And he LOVES tuna fish sandwiches.
